metadata.Description: The United Nations Development Programme is the United Nations' global development network, advocating for change and connecting countries to knowledge, experience and resources to help people build a better life.

UNDP.Description: UNDP aims to achieve the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), which include goals for energy, climate, and environmental sustainability.
UNDP supports the development and implementation of renewable energy projects to promote sustainable energy sources worldwide.
UNDP collaborates with governments to foster policies that promote sustainable energy and environmental conservation.
UNDP partners with international agencies to enhance global efforts towards sustainable energy and development.
UNDP engages the private sector in funding and innovation for sustainable energy projects to leverage private investment in sustainability.
